title: Ranked rewards not coming up
body: Didn't get a silver icon from ranked teams, and the ranked ward i had 75 points for i got the 15 point ward

replies.body:
The icon and skin rewards can take some time to roll out (usually up to two weeks after the start of the rollout which was this morning). As for the ward skin, I would recommend submitting a ticket to player support if you believe you have received the wrong tier and they ought to be able to help you out.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
